sense.name: make reference to, bring up, name, note
sense.examples: "His name was mentioned in connection with the invention." "She mentioned committee's plans with a touch of skepticism." "The director causally mentioned his dissappointment to his assistant." "The professor mentioned that the class will be canceled due to lack of enrollment." "It should be mentioned that it is wise to use up the can before puncturing it." "She mentioned that it was a fine day to go sailing." "It should be mentioned that I don't advise anyone to go blindly accepting packages from Tokyo."
